name: Kensho Ornos
description: Combining luxury with traditional Cycladic touches, Kensho Ornos boast elegantly designed units with state-of-the-art amenities within a 1-minute walk of Ornos Beach. Some feature their own private pool, while others are equipped with a private hot tub. Free WiFi is available throughout. Bright and airy, each air-conditioned room and suite boasts a bathroom with a spa bath, as well as free luxury Hermes bath amenities and is equipped with a hairdryer. Most of them open to a furnished terrace with magnificent sea, pool and mountain views. There is a seating area in every room, along with a flat-screen LED TV, a Nespresso machine and an iPad with unlimited access to music lists and the Kensho app which allows you to contact with all hotels departments instantly. The awarded gourmet restaurant of Kensho Boutique Hotel & Suites enjoys Ornos beach views and offers Greek and Mediterranean cuisine with fresh and local ingredients from all over Greece. Embrace in a laid-back atmosphere, sophisticated lounge experience at the famous Kensho bar where the experienced mixologists offer signature cocktails and refreshing drinks. Relaxing moments can be enjoyed at the property's hammam. The more active ones can use the on-site fitness centre. The spa has a make-up artist and a hairdresser, and offers beauty, face, body and nail treatments. The hotel also offers car hire services. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, featuring an array of premium boutiques and high-end restaurants, lies within 3 km of Kensho Ornos. The lively Psarou Beach is at 3 km. Mykonos Airport is 4 km way. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mykonos Blanc
description: Mykonos Blanc Hotel is a 5-star beachfront luxury boutique hotel in Mykonos, a proud member of the LVX Preferred Hotels and Resorts network. The non-color conformity of its interiors and exterior outdoor landscape acts as a soft touch to the soul, embossing the intense blue nature of the Aegean sea and the cosmopolitan lifestyle of Mykonian living, making Mykonos Blanc luxury boutique hotel, the perfect holiday canvas at the popular Ornos bay in Mykonos. Mykonos Blanc Hotel features 42 luxury seaside boutique styled rooms and suites. This dreamy luxury hotel has one and only destination, the everyday living at sea. Arched doorways and candle-lit living areas give this wonder-around feeling. Follow the path to a pool and garden wonderworld, a dreamy riviera landscape overlooking the blue waters of Ornos bay in Mykonos. Indulge in an in-room relaxing hot tubbing with a sea-view bliss, romancing or friend-mingling during evenings at their own en-suite lounging space. Yet, as an element of surprise, the secluded calm is interchanged by the upbeat Mykonian fun, a few steps further away on the coast of Ornos bay, on a choice of award winning resto’s and beach bars. Try out exotic gourmet pleasures at Kuzina Mykonos and Pasaji’s Asian Fusion cuisine and the trattoria Farina of Italian origin.

Tourlos Beach is 1.5 km from Nomia Sunset Suites Mykonos, while Agia Anna Beach is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the hotel.

name: Belvedere Hotel
address: School Of Fine Arts District, Mykonos 846 00
description: This chic hotel in Mykonos’ Chora offers a magnificent swimming pool with sunset views, a 24-hour state-of-the-art gym, gourmet restaurant and airy rooms with beautiful sea views. Guests can enjoy a variety of invigorating and restorative treatments at Six Senses Mykonos upon request. Guest can enjoy fine dining at Matsuhisa Mykonos or the Belvedere Club. Live performances are organized during the summer season. Belvedere’s front-office team will be happy to assist guests with travel arrangements and restaurants reservations. Valet parking and concierge service is offered. Daily newspapers, magazines, books, as well as complimentary internet points are available.

description: With a stay at The White Stone Suites in Mykonos, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Ornos Beach and Windmills of Mykonos. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

description: Sofia Village is located 400 metres from Mykonos Town. It offers an attractive pool and a sunny breakfast room with outdoor terrace, as well as free WiFi in public areas. Guests can relax in the lovely garden that surrounds the building and take a dip in the pool. The friendly hosts are happy to offer suggestions on restaurants and sightseeing. Boheme Mykonos Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

Our hotel also features a stunning lounge area with a breathtaking view of the Aegean Sea and the picturesque town below. She Mykonos Boutique Hotel is conveniently located in a quiet spot of the town, yet very close to all the shops, bars and restaurants of the centre.

Each is equipped with free WiFi, satellite LCD TV and working desk. Some rooms include an outdoor hot tub or pool. The coastal suites are located in Agios Ioannis, at the Bill & Coo Coast adults-only complex, 3 km from the main complex and 3.5 from Mykonos town. Bill & Coo brand-new Villas are located a few meters away from Megali Ammos beach and connected with Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge property through an internal path. The hotel's awarded fine dining restaurant, the Gastronomy Project, is situated by the pool and offers spectacular sea and sunset views. It serves a Mediterranean creative cuisine based on seasonal local products. Signature cocktails and refreshing drinks are proposed at the sunset lounge bar. Beauty and body treatments are available at the Spa by Valmont as well a gym in the spa area. The hotel offers a great array of personalised services including round-trip transfers to Mykonos Airport and port. Bill & Coo is conveniently located 10 minutes walking distance from Mykonos Town. It is 2.5 km from the Mykonos Airport and port.

name: Mykonos Ammos Hotel
description: Situated on the sandy and lively Ornos Beach, the 5-star boutique hotel of Mykonos Ammos provides trendy sun loungers and beach service. Member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, it features an outdoor pool, and a wellness and beauty centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Stylishly decorated with earth tones and white washed walls, the spacious rooms and suites are air conditioned. Each comes with a 37” flat-screen TV, DVD player, laptop safe, toiletries and hairdryer. They all open out to a terrace or balcony, while some offer sea views. Kuzina Restaurant provides fusion culinary dishes that combine Asian and Mediterranean flavours and can be enjoyed by the seaside. Farina Italian Restaurant serves genuine Italian cuisine in a stylish setting, while Mykonos Ammos Beach and Bar prepares signature cocktails throughout the day. Room service is also accessible. Guests are provided with complimentary beach towels and daily newspapers. The 24-hour front desk can arrange tours of Mykonos and concierge services upon request with surcharge. Mykonos Ammos Hotel is just 2.5 km from Mykonos Town, as well as Mykonos Airport and the port. Various restaurants, cafés and a supermarket are all within a short walking distance. Private parking can be found on site.

name: Kouros Hotel & Suites
description: Located on the seafront of Mykonos town, just 300 metres from Mykonos Town, the Kouros Hotel & Suites offers elegant accommodation and a quiet location with views over the old and new harbours. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Each of the rooms at Kouros Hotel & Suites is large and luxuriously appointed while retaining the charm of the typical Cycladic architecture. All rooms have private terraces with Aegean Sea views. Mykonos Airport is 3 km away. Free private parking is available in the premises.

name: Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels Of The World
description: The 5-star Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels of the World boasts stunning views of the Aegean Sea and a private beach area. It includes spa facilities, gourmet cuisine, hot tub and 3 swimming pools. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All air-conditioned rooms of Myconian Imperial have modern décor and balconies with superb views of Elia Beach. They are equipped with an LCD satellite TV, DVD/CD player and safety box. Some feature outdoor hot tubs or private pools. A rich American breakfast is offered at Meltemi. Fine Mediterranean dishes are served at the Celebrities a la carte restaurant. Guests also have the choice of 2 cocktail bars and a beach bar. Mykonos Airport is around 10 km away from the resort. The picturesque town of Mykonos with whitewashed, Cycladic-style houses, bars and shops is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Petinaros Hotel
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Mykonos City, Petinaros Hotel & Studios promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Petinaros Hotel & Studios. Air conditioning can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Petinaros Hotel & Studios.Agoda

name: Eden View Suites & Villas
description: Set just 200 metres from Paradise Beach, Eden View Suites & Villas features a two-building complex of self-catering units, each with a private, outdoor pool. Traditional, yet modern in style, each suite or maisonette at Eden View Suites & Villas opens to a spacious veranda with sea views. A 24 hour bus stop is 300 metres from the premises and can take you straight to the city centre. The cosmopolitan Mykonos City is 6 km away. Mykonos Airport is 5 km from the property.

name: Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites
description: Located in Plintri, 2.1 km from Super Paradise Beach, Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers free shuttle service and room service. The hotel has a terrace and mountain views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available daily, and includes American, vegetarian and vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites. Mykonos Windmills is 5.1 km from the accommodation, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites.

name: Hotel Alkyon
description: Alkyon Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Mykonos Town. It offers a swimming pool, and spacious rooms with balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The elegant rooms are equipped with satellite TV and minibar, and each has a spacious bathroom with bathtub. From their private terrace guests enjoy breathtaking view of the Mykonos bay. The pool area features free sun loungers for guests to relax while enjoying the views. There is a pool bar that serves cocktails and snacks. A rich breakfast with homemade products is served daily. 24-hour room service is offered. The hotel offers free shuttle service to and from the port and airport. A bus stop with frequent service is just opposite the hotel offering great connection to the island’s beaches. Staff at the 24-hour reception can offer travel information and arrange car and bicycle rental. Free private parking is possible at Hotel Alkyon.

name: Carbonaki Hotel
description: Carbonaki Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Mykonos City area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, fax machine, photocopying are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, massage, garden. Discover all Mykonos has to offer by making Carbonaki Hotel your base.priceline.com

name: La Maison Blanche
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a coffee/tea maker. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Leonis Summer Houses
description: A 10-minute walk from Ornos beach, Leonis Summer Houses is 3 km from Mykonos town. It features an outdoor swimming pool with hydromassage facilities and sun beds. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout. Equipped with a furnished balcony with town and sea views, all the units offer a flat-screen satellite TV and air conditioning. They include a seating area and a kitchen with fridge and a Nespresso coffee maker. Some units are split level maisonettes, while all of them have an i Pod docking station. A continental breakfast consisting of fresh products is prepared daily and can be enjoyed in the privacy of your room upon request or at the on-site bar. A variety of refreshments and light snacks is also served. The tour desk can provide information on local attractions and excursions. Leonis Summer Houses is located 4 km from Mykonos Airport. Transfers to and from the airport are available upon request at an extra charge. Various restaurants, cafés-bars are located on Ornos beach.

name: Bill & Coo Coast Suites - Adults Only
description: Located right on the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Bill & Coo Coast Suites boasts a water's edge swimming pool and a restaurant serving traditional Greek cuisine. Blending traditional Cycladic decoration with modern minimalistic touches, every suite at Bill & Coo Coast opens to a balcony with Aegean Sea views while some also enjoy pool views. Some units feature a private pool, while others feature an outdoor hot tub. Each features a seating area where a satellite, flat-screen TV is also available. Guests may also use the iPad provided. Every suite features a state of the art bathroom stocked with a shower and free toiletries. Greek & American breakfast is served. The on-site bar features an abundance of refreshments. Massage treatments can be enjoyed on request and at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos is located within approximately 4 km of Bill & Coo Coast Suites. Mykonos Port is 6 km away, while Mykonos Airport is at 4 km. Free private parking is possible on-site.

name: Ostraco Suites
description: Located on a hilltop, the Ostraco Suites offers breathtaking views over the Aegean Sea. This luxury boutique hotel features a freeform pool with a sun terrace and a stylish cocktail bar. Mykonos Town is 600 metres away. The individually decorated Ostraco Suites reflect the distinctive Mykonos island aesthetics. Each is spacious with white-washed walls, stylish furniture and sunny terraces with stone-paved floors. Your day starts with a la Carte breakfast, served at the beautiful pool area, between 8:30 and 11:00, and prepared right in front of you. Throughout the day the bar serves cocktails and a variety of drinks. The hotel spa offers a variety of treatments. The attentive hotel staff is available 24-hours a day, offering car rental services and arranging boat and plane trips.

name: Harmony Boutique Hotel
description: Harmony Boutique Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Mykonos, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service are readily available for you to enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, massage. For reliable service and professional staff, Harmony Boutique Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Million Stars Mykonos
description: No description found

name: Epic Blue Mykonos
description: Situated in Houlakia, 800 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Epic Blue Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Choulakas Beach is 800 metres from the hotel, while Tourlos Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Epic Blue Mykonos.

name: De.light
description: Overlooking Delos Island, De.Light Hotel offers spacious and air-conditioned suites with a terrace or balcony boasting Aegean Sea views. It features an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub and free Wi-Fi throughout. With minimal décor, the bright accommodation comes with a LED satellite TV, CD/DVD player, minibar, and seating area. Complimentary toiletries, bathrobes, slippers, hairdryer are included in the modern bathroom. Some may also have a spa bath, steam bath, hydromassage shower or private pool. Refreshing cocktails and light snacks are served at the pool bar. The restaurant at De.Light prepares Greek and International cuisine that consists of seasonal products. In-suite dining is available upon request. Guests can enjoy a breakfast each morning. The 24-hour reception desk can provide information on local beaches such as Ornos and Agios Ioannis. Massage treatments can be arranged by the hotel with surcharge. De.Light Hotel is 4 km from the lively town of Mykonos and Mykonos Airport. Private parking is available on site at no charge.

name: Tagoo Black Mykonos
description: The Cycladic-style Tagoo Black Mykonos is set above the old Mykonos Port, 600 metres from Tourlos Beach. There is a swimming pool with poolside bar with a shaded area overlooking the sea ideal for breakfast or evening sunsets. Featuring minimalist style and soothing colours, all rooms at Tagoo Black Mykonos have a sea view, a private balcony and private pool overlooking the Aegean Sea. Each includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and fridge. Agios Stefanos Beach is just 2 km away. The centre of Mykonos Town is within a 10-minute walk. Staff can arrange car, motorcycle and mini boat rentals, while shuttle service is provided upon request at surcharge.

name: Flaskos Suites
description: Flaskos Suites and more are located only a few steps from the sandy beach of Agios Stefanos. They offer great views of Delos, Syros and Tinos. Free internet is provided. A sea-water pool is available for use. The Cycladic style complex comprises of suites, rooms, as well as studios and apartments with air conditioning. Some have a balcony with an outdoor dining area and some also have a view of the sea. Homemade delicacies and drinks are served at the poolside snack-bar. The complex also features a mini market. At just 20 metres from the property, visitors can find Greek traditional taverns. Mykonos City is 2.5 km away.

name: Casa Anna Suites
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, Casa Anna Suites is quietly located in the scenic town of Mykonos, within 700 metres of restaurants, bars and shops. It features suites with free WiFi. Tourlos Beach is 300 metres away. Each unit at Casa Anna Suites blends traditional Cycladic architecture with modern elements. Some feature sea views. A 32" TV and fridge are standard. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out the famous Little Venice and Mykonos Windmills within 1 km. The new port is at 1.5 km, while the old one is 600 metres away. Mykonos Airport is located 3 km from the accommodation. Transfer to Mykonos centre is provided upon request. Free private parking is provided upon request.

name: Mykonos Pantheon
address: Kalo Livadi Mykonos, Mykonos, Gr, Mykonos - All Locations, PA23 7QH, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located on the long sandy Kalo Livadi Beach, the Cycladic-style Mykonos Pantheon offers an infinity pool and snack bar. It offers accommodation with free WiFi and balcony overlooking the Aegean Sea, the pool and garden. A fridge is included in all the air-conditioned units at the Mykonos Pantheon. Each has a flat-screen TV and a traditional style built-in shower. Guests may enjoy traditional Greek dishes on site. Bars and cafés can be found at a distance of 200 metres. Ano Mera village is just 2 km away and has taverns and restaurants. The property boasts a conference room that can host up to 24 people. A leisure room with chess, backgammon, movies and music is also featured. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange car rental. Transfer from the port and airport can be arranged upon request and at an extra charge.

name: Villa Elina suites and more
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include designer toiletries, laundry facilities, towels, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Damianos Mykonos Hotel
description: This hospitable complex is situated in the scenic settlement of Drossopezoula, close to the Mykonos town centre. Damianos Hotel offers stylish accommodation, quality services and excellent facilities for a pleasant and relaxing stay. Welcome drinks are offered on arrival to get your holiday started. Mykonos rests on the western side of Mykonos and is the capital and main port of the island. This picturesque town is characterised by its windmills, traditional whitewashed houses and narrow, winding streets. There are various clubs, cafes, bars, taverns and restaurants nearby, which all offer a thriving night life without spoiling the tradition and serenity of the town.

name: Rochari Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in the heart of Mykonos Town, Hotel Rochari offers buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The hotel outdoor swimming pool with stunning views to the town and the Aegean Sea and a garden. Mykonos Windmills is 500 metres away and Little Venice is a 6-minute walk from the hotel. Each room includes a bathroom with bath or shower and free toiletries, mini fringe, flat-screen TV, safe, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities. The on-site restaurant serves Greek cuisine. Hotel Rochari offers a terrace. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include the Archaeological Museum of Mykonos and Mykonos Old Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the property. Nammos Mykonos is 3.2 km away.

name: New Aeolos Hotel
description: At a distance of 800 metres from Mykonos City Centre, Aeolos Hotel offers a large pool with hydromassage facilities and elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Free airport/port transfer is also provided from 7:00 to 23:00. The spacious and airy rooms are furnished with modern décor, while their balconies overlook the gardens or the pool. All rooms and suites are air conditioned and include flat-screen, satellite TV, mini fridge, hairdryer and safe. Guests enjoy a varied breakfast buffet including homemade delicacies. Facilities include a bar and an a la carte restaurant, while refreshing cocktails can be served by the poolside. Aeolos Hotel is just opposite the bus stop and within easy reach from the vibrant Mykonos Town centre. The friendly staff will happily assist guests with recommendations on places to visit, and maps and information about the island. A good selection of restaurants is available in the surrounding area. Private parking at the hotel is free.

name: Marisso Hotel
description: Perched on a hill overlooking the scenic capital of Mykonos, Marisso Hotel features a pool with sun terrace and a snack bar. The traditionally-built property offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a balcony with views over the Aegean Sea or the garden. Bright and airy, the air-conditioned units of Marisso Hotel are tastefully decorated with modern furnishings and traditional elements. Featuring tiled floors, each room and studio includes a satellite TV and a fridge.The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Free laptops are provided upon request and an in-room massage treatment can be arranged. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with car and bicycle rental to explore the island. Marisso Hotel is situated 3 km from Mykonos International Airport and 1 km from Mykonos main Port. The sandy beach of Megali Ammos is at 1 km, while Platys Gialos Beach is 4 km away.

name: Olia Hotel
description: Located 200 metres from Tourlos Port in Mykonos, Olia Hotel features an outdoor pool and snack bar. Its air-conditioned rooms offer a terrace or balcony overlooking the garden or Aegean Sea. The simply decorated units at Olia come with a satellite TV, safety deposit box and fridge. A hairdryer is included in the private bathroom. Guests can enjoy their refreshing drinks from the snack bar on the sun terrace surrounding the pool. Various restaurants, bars and cafés can be found within 1.5 km in the lively centre of Mykonos Town. The 24-hour front desk can arrange car rentals and provide information on various beaches such as, Agios Stefanos Beach only 1 km away and Paradise Beach 5 km away. An internet corner with Wi-Fi is available. Olia Hotel is 2.5 km from Mykonos Airport. Private parking can be found on site at no extra cost.

name: Aletro Cottage Houses
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 8 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a seasonal outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request). This aparthotel is 3.1 mi (5.1 km) from Ornos Beach and 4.3 mi (7 km) from Paradise Beach. Dining You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Aletro Cottage Houses, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. name: Colours of Mykonos
description: Located 800 metres from Psarou, the Colours of Mykonos Luxury Residences & Suites offers an outdoor pool. It offers self-catering accommodation with stylish décor and free WiFi. The suites and residences will provide you with air conditioning and a seating area. There is a kitchenette with a refrigerator and kitchenware. Featuring a shower, the bathroom also comes with bathrobes and free toiletries. Some units are fitted with a hot tub. At Colours of Mykonos Luxury Residences & Suites you will find a garden and a sun terrace. Complimentary beach and pool towels are offered. Free, private on-site parking is provided. Ornos Beach is 2 km from the property. Mykonos Airport is a 10-minute drive away. Free arrival and departure transfer is provided.

name: Amaris Mykonian Residence
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 11 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and ovens. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided weekly. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Business}, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Amaris Mykonian Residence in Mykonos, you'll be near the beach, a 3-minute drive from Ornos Beach and 7 minutes from Mykonos Old Port. This 4-star aparthotel is 6.3 mi (10.1 km) from Mykonos New Port and 5 mi (8 km) from Paradise Beach. name: Omnia Mykonos Boutique Hotel & Suites
description: Omnia Mykonos Boutique Hotel & Suites has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Ornos. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, free shuttle service and room service, along with free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature city views. At the hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak German, Greek, English and Spanish. Popular points of interest near Omnia Mykonos Boutique Hotel & Suites include Korfos, Ornos and Agios Ioannis Beach. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Katikies Mykonos - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: Located just 500 metres from the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Katikies Mykonos is a 5-star boutique hotel featuring a selection of fine dining options, 2 infinity pools, a spa centre and a gym. Blending Cycladic style with modern elements, the hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms and suites with unobstructed sea view. Featuring private pools or outdoor jetted tubs, the units at Katikies Mykonos open to a private terrace with lounge area. Facilities include a flat-screen satellite TV, I-Pod music player, Nespresso coffee machine, in-room safe and minibar. The modern bathrooms are fitted with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Room service is available 24/7. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool, enjoy a refreshing dip at the infinity pools or rejuvenate at the on-site spa centre offering a variety of massage sessions, feet washing rituals and rejuvenating facial and body treatments. A fashion boutique with Greek and international designers and brands is also featured on site. Dining options include Botrini's Mykonos restaurant. After the amazing success of Botrini’s Santorini in the emblematic Katikies Santorini Hotel, the island of Mykonos will be boasting its very own Botrini’s Restaurant in the stunning premises of Katikies Mykonos Hotel. Botrini’s Mykonos stays true to all the values that earned Botrini’s its multiple awards and of course its Michelin-star, but in a most mesmerising Cycladic setting with the eternal blue of the Aegean Sea serving as the ideal background. In a truly magical ambiance and in front of the infinity pool seamlessly blending in with the sea and the sky, guests sample the eye-catching dishes of renowned Greek-Italian chef Ettore Botrini. Here the freshest and finest gifts of the sea and the land find their way into the chef’s kitchen to be transformed into refined pieces of contemporary culinary art. At the Lower Deck Lounge, where the whitewashed background is disturbed only by the blooming bougainvilleas, that is where you can spend a full day dedicated to the indulgence of your palate and the relaxation of your mind. The glorious Greek sun reflects its beams on the iconic whitewashed setting of the Upper Deck Lounge and the view of the infinity pool almost becoming one with the azure waters of the Aegean Sea where you can take your pick from the tempting choices of the exciting all-day menu, based on Greek flavours but with a creative international touch. Finally, Fleur de Miraval's ultra-chic Champagne Bar awaits to become your personal haven of elegance and exquisite tastes.

name: Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos
description: Located in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 300 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Kapari Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Korfos is a 16-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos.

name: Semeli Hotel
description: The sophisticated Hotel Semeli is situated in Mykonos town, 500m from Megali Ammos beach. It boasts tastefully decorated accommodation with sea, town or garden views, a sweet-water, heated pool with sun beds and a spa. All rooms or suites at Semeli Hotel Mykonos have a flat screen TV, seating area, marble bathroom and French doors with sea views. Whitewashed walls and a garden with geraniums and bougainvilleas provide the rooms’ exterior setting. Some units have an indoor or an outdoor hot tub. The a la carte restaurant Thioni serves a rich buffet breakfast by the pool. Greek and Italian cuisine is served throughout the day indoors or on the veranda overlooking the sea or the garden. Guests can enjoy cocktails at the hotel's pool bar. Guests can make use of the Semeli Hotel Mykonos gym facilities or relax with a Turkish hammam, or a massage session at the Semeli Spa. A variety of facial and body treatments are available. Within walking distance, guests can reach the centre of Mykonos town where many bars, cafes and restaurants can be found. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel and free private on-site parking is possible.

name: Casa Grande
description: Blending traditional Cycladic decoration elements with modern touches, Casa Grande Hotel is set in Platis Yialos and features an outdoor pool. The sea is just a short stroll away. Guests may enjoy an abundance of refreshments at the on-site bar. Free WiFi is provided. Each room at Casa Grande Hotel opens to a furnished balcony or patio facing the garden, while some also boast sea views. Each room features a modern bathroom stocked with a shower and hairdryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in every room. Air conditioning comes standard. Guests may relax at the property's sun terrace. Free airport shuttle service is provided. The cosmopolitan Mykonos City, featuring an array of lively restaurants and bars, is 4 km away. The scenic Little Venice lies within approximately 3.7 km of the property. Mykonos Port is at 6 km, while Mykonos National Airport is 3.5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Andronikos Hotel
description: Located on a small hilltop overlooking Mykonos Town, Andronikos Hotel boasts an award-winning restaurant and also features an outdoor pool and wellness centre. Each airy room is distinctive in style, while all have a large bed, minibar and free Wi-Fi. Many rooms offer a spa bath, while most have fantastic views of the island and the sea. You can explore authentic Greek cuisine at the exquisite Lady Finger Restaurant which serves a 4-course degustation menu. Located around the pool, the Orange Blue Bar serves snacks around the clock. Guests can start the day with a rich buffet breakfast. At the Earth Spa, you can indulge in beauty therapies and massages with exclusive beauty products. There is also a mini gym, with state-of-the-art equipment, that will help you stay fit. Andronikos Hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Mykonos Town. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Nama Villas
description: No description found

name: Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts
address: P.O. Box 64, Mykonos Town, Mykonos, Greece, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located in Mykonos City, Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mykonos. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer towels, closet, flat screen television, linens, private pool to ensure a restful night. Access to the property's fitness center, outdoor pool, spa, massage will further enhance your already satisfying stay. Myconian Naia - Preferred Hotels & Resorts is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: A Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a quiet countryside area only 15 minutes' walk from Mykonos Town, The A Hotel by Mykonos Arhontiko offers charming accommodation with a swimming pool and hot tub. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and free shuttle service. The tastefully decorated rooms and apartments at the A Hotel come each with a furnished patio overlooking the pool. They are built in traditional Cycladic style, and their facilities include air conditioning, satellite LCD TV and a fridge. A rich breakfast comes with the room served in the restaurant, where lunch and dinner is available for the rest of the day. If you wish, you can just spend a day at the Arhontiko with all amenities available. The swimming pool follows eco-friendly standards for water purification. Next to the pool, you will find the hot tub, as well as wooden deck chairs with mattresses, umbrellas and a pool bar. Staff are readily available for your car/bike rentals, island tours, as well as restaurant reservations, massage appointments and more. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Avra Mykonos
description: Offering a sun terrace with sea view, the traditionally built Avra Mykonos is situated in Tourlos, 700 metres from Mykonos New Port and 1 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town. It offers accommodation with a balcony or terrace. The air-conditioned units feature a bathroom with shower. A flat-screen TV is also available. Bed linen is offered. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. Some units feature a private outdoor mini pool. Mykonos Airport is 3.4 km away.

name: Amperian Mykonos Suites & Villas
description: Featuring a garden, an outdoor pool and sea views, Amperian Mykonos Suites & Villas is situated in Mýkonos City. These suites are equipped with 1 or 2 bedrooms, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven. A flat-screen TV is featured. Some units are fitted with a private pool or a hot tub. Nammos Mykonos is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Mykonos Windmills is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from Amperian Mykonos Suites & Villas. Located 500 meters away from the nearest beach.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free valet parking is available onsite. name: Mykonos Princess Hotel
description: Mykonos Princess is located within walking distance of the sandy Beach of Agios Stefanos. It features a magnificent sea view pool, modern rooms with luxury amenities, and a Greek contemporary restaurant. The rooms of Mykonos Princess all feature free internet access and they each include a satellite LCD TV, a minibar and a safe. Most of the rooms have a furnished sea-view balcony or terrace. The wellness center features a gym. Discover the path to a healthier lifestyle with a variety of wellness services available at Mykonos Princess Wellness Center. Indulge in complete serenity and privacy with a revitalizing massage and experience a unique sense of relaxation. Re-energize mind, body and soul with a wide selection of fitness services and programs that can be customized to address your specific exercise goals. Al a carte breakfast is served daily in the dining and pool area. The hotel’s restaurant serves modern Greek cuisine in a romantic poolside setting. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar with views of Mykonos Town and Delos island Mykonos Airport is 4.8 km from Mykonos Princess. The picturesque town of Mykonos is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Kalesma Mykonos
description: Set in Ornos, 1.1 km from Ornos, Kalesma Mykonos offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge and an oven. At Kalesma Mykonos all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Vegetarian and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. At Kalesma Mykonos you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Glyfadi Beach is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Agios Ioannis Beach is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Kalesma Mykonos.

name: Alissachni Mykonos
description: Situated in Psarou, 2.9 km from Psarou Beach, Alissachni Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Alissachni Mykonos rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Alissachni Mykonos. Platis Gialos Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Alissachni Mykonos.

name: Kivotos Mykonos
description: Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel is situated on Mykonos Island, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach and a saltwater swimming pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and squash courts. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Mykonos Spa Club. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Part of the premium service at Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel includes items such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. Deluxe fixtures include a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite channels and luxury linen and luxury toiletries. A mini bar, a seating area and a private balcony are also included. The chic bar is a convenient place to relax with a drink before a meal at the restaurant, which offers international and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. Within a 20-minute drive of Paradise Beach and Mykonos Island National Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. Guests can also take an easy stroll to Agios Ioannis and Psarou.Revato

name: Peristeronas Village
description: Peristeronas Village is a self-catering accommodation located in Mykonos. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 1.8 km from Mykonos Old Port and Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. Shops and cafes are within 300 metres while a supermarket is 10 metres away. The apartment will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a patio. Private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower. You can enjoy mountain view and garden view from the room. At Peristeronas Village you will find an airport shuttle, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities like an ironing service and laundry facilities are offered. A bus stop offering connection with various beaches and Mykonos Town is round the corner. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Little Venice (2.2 km) and Mykonos Windmills (2.3 km). Mykonos Airport is located 2 km from the property. A bus to the beaches of Panormos, Elia, Kalo Livadi and Kalafatis stops right outside the property. Mykonos Town is 1.5 km away.

name: Livin Mykonos Hotel
description: Livin Mykonos Hotel enjoys a convenient location 1.1 km from Mykonos Town and 3 km from the popular Psarrou Beach. It has an outdoor pool with poolside bar and offers elegant rooms and suites with private balconies overlooking the lush garden or Mykonos Town. Accommodation at Livin Mykonos follows the traditional Cycladic style decorated with modern touches. Facilities include a flat-screen TV, minibar and air conditioning, while some units also have a living area. Mykonos Port is 4 km away and the airport is at 1 km. Free private parking is available.

name: Rhenia Mykonos
description: Set in Tourlos, Mykonos region, Rhenia Hotel is situated a 5-minute walk from Mykonos New Port. This 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with sea views. The property is 2 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms at Rhenia Hotel open to a balcony or terrace. Each is fitted with a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Mykonos Airport is 4 km away.

name: Fabrica Sunset Apartments
description: Well set in the centre of Megali Ammos, Fabrica Sunset Apartments provides free WiFi throughout the property, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a garden, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 400 metres from Megali Ammos Beach, 400 metres from Agios Charalabos Beach and less than 1 km from Agia Anna Beach. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with sea views. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Fabrica Sunset Apartments include Mykonos Windmills, Archaeological Museum of Mykonos and Mykonos Old Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: Panthea Residence
description: With a stay at Panthea Residence in Mykonos, you'll be near the airport, just a 3-minute walk from Agios Ioannis Beach and a 2-minute drive from Ornos Beach. Featured amenities include luggage storage and a library. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request), and a cruise ship terminal shuttle is also provided at no charge.Hotels.com

address: Agios Stefanos, Greece Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites, Agios Stefanos 846 00
description: Set in Agios Stefanos, within 200 metres of Choulakas Beach and 600 metres of Agios Stefanos Beach, Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites offers accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 2.3 km from Tourlos Beach, 2.5 km from Mykonos New Port and 3.7 km from Archaeological Museum of Mykonos. The accommodation provides room service, a business centre and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Mykonos Old Port is 3.7 km from the accommodation, while Little Venice is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 5 km from Mykonos Soul Luxury Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Obsession Mykonos
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a pool waterfall and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and free WiFi. Other amenities include designer toiletries, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia
